layout.title: Category List Layout
layout.message: This layout shows a list of all weblink categories.

state.name: Weblinks category List Layout
state.description: This layout shows a list of all weblink categories.

param.name: menu_image
param.label: Menu Image
param.description: A small image to be placed to the left or right of your menu item, images must be in images/stories/

param.name: pageclass_sfx
param.label: Page Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css classes of the page, this allows individual page styling

param.name: back_button
param.label: Back Button
param.description: Show/Hide a Back Button, that returns you to the previously view page

param.name: header
param.label: Page Title
param.description: Text to display at the top of the page. If left blank, the Menu name will be used instead

param.name: item_description
param.label: Link Descriptions
param.description: Show/Hide the Description text of the Links

param.name: other_cat_section
param.label: Category List - Section
param.description: Show/Hide the List of Categories in List view page

param.name: other_cat
param.label: Category List - Category
param.description: Show/Hide the List of Categories in Table view page

param.name: description_text
param.label: Description Text
param.description: Description for page, if left blank it will load _WEBLINKS_DESC from your language file

param.name: image
param.label: Image
param.description: Image for page, must be located in the /images/stories folder. Default will load web_links.jpg, No image will mean an image is not loaded

param.name: weblink_icons
param.label: Icon
param.description: Icon to be used to the left of the url links in Table view
